game.name: Le Petit Raccoon
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드
game.shortDescription: Le Petit Raccoon is a stealth cooking game where you must steal food to cook for your hungry guests! Steal food from the grocery store, but don't get caught! Time is of the essence, and your customers are waiting.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Le Petit Raccoon is a stealth cooking game where you must steal food to cook for your hungry guests! Steal food from the grocery store, but don't get caught! Time is of the essence, and your customers are waiting.
